definition:
-   $(x'_n)\subset X'$

-   $X$ a Banach space

-   $\exists x'\in X':\forall x\in X:\lim_{n\rightarrow \infty} x(x'_n)\equiv x'_n(x)=x'(x)$.

-   If $X$ is , then weak\* convergence is the same as weak convergence

phrase: Weak* Convergence In Normed Linear Space
